model

Class Sign

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Sign

  • public class Sign
extends java.lang.Object
    Description of the Sign class
    Used to store data about recognized signs such as their belief, plausibility and relation to other recognized signs.
    Author:
    Watnuss

        Description of Sign(Relation rel, String signType, double belief, double plausibility)
        Constructor of Sign class.
        Parameters:
        rel - Reference to the inside relation which created this sign
        signType - Name of the Sign
        belief - Belief with which the sign was created
        plausibility - Plausibility of this sign

        Description of generateRelation(ArrayList relaions, ArrayList signs) Checks whether this Sign is part of an "on top" Relation and if this "on top" Relation contains another valid Sign.
        Parameters:
        relations - ArrayList containing all existing relations
        signs - ArrayList containing all existing signs
